p: The second period is marked by the introduction of the vaccine against rubella, while the rubella infection occurred in epidemic form, and the disease was registered with a declining trend until 2005. The highest incidence rate of 939.1 and 653.6 per 100,000 inhabitants was reported in 1995 and 1994, respectively, while the lowest coverage of the MMR vaccine (82%) was registered in 2000.
